section.title: Have questions?

questions.question: What is VintDress?
questions.answer: VintDress is a revolutionary platform that uses Replicate FLUX Kontext Pro artificial intelligence to transform your clothing photos into professional images with realistic virtual models. Our service integrates perfectly with Vinted: simply paste your listing URL or upload a photo, configure your ideal model, and get a photo that boosts your sales up to 5x in 30 seconds.

questions.question: How does VintDress work?
questions.answer: The process is ultra-simple in 3 steps: 1) Import your garment via a Vinted URL or by uploading a photo, 2) Configure your virtual model (gender, skin tone, body type, pose, background, clothing type, face masking option), 3) Our AI automatically generates a professional photo in 15-30 seconds according to your settings. You can choose whether to mask the model's face or not according to your preferences.

questions.question: What types of clothing can I transform?
questions.answer: VintDress works with all types of clothing: dresses, tops, pants, jeans, jackets, coats, shoes, accessories, etc. Our advanced configuration allows you to specify the exact type of garment (dress, shirt, pants, etc.) to optimize rendering. The AI automatically adapts to each piece to create the most realistic virtual model possible according to your preferences.

questions.question: How to take the best photo of my clothing?
questions.answer: For best results: 1) Photograph the clothing on a neutral background, 2) Make sure it's clearly visible and well-lit, 3) Avoid excessive wrinkles, 4) Frame the entire garment. Our AI will do the rest!

questions.question: Can I customize the virtual model?
questions.answer: Yes! You can choose: gender (female/male), skin tone, body type, posture, and background setting. These options allow you to create the perfect image for your target audience.

questions.question: How long does generation take?
questions.answer: Generation typically takes between 15 and 30 seconds. You can follow the progress in real-time thanks to our loading animation. Once completed, your image is automatically saved to your account.

questions.question: Can I download my generated images?
questions.answer: Absolutely! All your images are saved in your account. You can download them anytime from the 'History' tab in your personal space, with before/after comparison.

questions.question: What are the pricing options?
questions.answer: We offer 3 options: Starter Pack at €3.49 (10 generations), Pro Pack at €6.99 (25 generations), and Premium Subscription at €11.99/month (40 monthly generations). Choose according to your needs!

questions.question: How do credits work?
questions.answer: 1 credit = 1 image generation. Pack credits never expire. For the monthly subscription, you receive 40 credits that automatically renew each month.

questions.question: Can I combine multiple packs?
questions.answer: Yes! You can purchase multiple credit packs that add up. You can also have a monthly subscription AND credit packs at the same time.

questions.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
questions.answer: You can cancel your subscription anytime from your account space. Cancellation takes effect at the end of your current billing period, and you keep your credits until that date.

questions.question: Does VintDress really improve sales?
questions.answer: Yes! Our users see an average increase of 3 to 5x in their sales. Photos with virtual models generate more views, more likes, and sell faster at better prices.

questions.question: Why do modeled photos sell better?
questions.answer: Buyers can better visualize the clothing being worn, evaluate the fit and drape. This creates trust and reduces uncertainty, leading to faster purchases at higher prices.

questions.question: Can I use the images on other platforms?
questions.answer: Absolutely! The generated images belong to you. You can use them on Vinted, Leboncoin, Depop, or any other selling platform. They're perfect everywhere!

questions.question: Are my photos secure?
questions.answer: Yes, completely. Your photos are securely stored on European servers. They are only accessible by you and are never shared or used for other purposes.

questions.question: Can I choose to mask the model's face or not?
questions.answer: Yes, you have the choice! VintDress offers a 'Mask face' option in the model configuration. If enabled, the face will be masked (usually with a smartphone) to respect privacy and avoid image rights issues. If disabled, the virtual model's face will be visible. This flexibility allows you to adapt the rendering according to your preferences and sales strategy.

questions.question: Can I delete my data?
questions.answer: Yes, you have total control. You can delete your generated images anytime from your account. If you delete your account, all your data is permanently erased.

questions.question: How does the affiliate program work?
questions.answer: It's simple! Share your unique referral code with friends. When they make their first purchase, you both receive 1 free generation. It's win-win!

questions.question: Where do I find my referral code?
questions.answer: Your unique referral code is in the 'Affiliation' tab of your account space. You can copy it directly or share the pre-filled link.

questions.question: How many people can I refer?
questions.answer: There's no limit! You can refer as many people as you want. Each new referred customer earns you 1 free generation.

questions.question: When do I receive my free generations?
questions.answer: Free generations are credited automatically as soon as your referral makes their first purchase, regardless of the chosen offer (pack or subscription).
